sentences.en: A team leader was appointed to oversee the project.
sentences.cn: 任命了一位组长来监管该工程。

sentences.en: Call in an architect or surveyor to oversee the work.
sentences.cn: 找个建筑师或监理员来监工。

sentences.en: Develop and oversee supplier contracts for both new stores and regular promotion.
sentences.cn: 制作及管理新店开业和常规促销的相关合同.

sentences.en: Ensure and oversee that all export documents are in order.
sentences.cn: 检查所有出口单据,确保正确无误.

sentences.en: Farmers oversee breeding to ensure the sow is receptive and successfully bred.
sentences.cn: 这时就要给她们配种,在配种时,农场主要仔细观察看母猪是不是能成功的配上.

sentences.en: He used to oversee my place on the lake, and did it capitally, too.
sentences.cn: 他替我看管湖边那所别墅, 管理得非常出色.

sentences.en: Lute will [ oversee ] fighting in the Iraq and Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 卢特 将视察伊拉克和阿富汗的战况.

sentences.en: Oversee laboratory procedures to ensure efficiency and to avoid foreseeable technical problems.
sentences.cn: 管理实验室,确保其有效运作.

sentences.en: Oversee the appearance , operation , maintenance and servicing of the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 管理汽车日常的保养及维修.

sentences.en: Oversee the creation and distribution of quality measure report.
sentences.cn: 制定和分发质量改进报告.

sentences.en: Oversee the repair & reconditioning works carried out in the workshop.
sentences.cn: 确保维修 和 翻新工作在工厂顺利开展.

sentences.en: Pastors are called by God to that role to oversee the church.
sentences.cn: 牧师就是蒙召去肩负这个角色,负责监察教会.

sentences.en: Several hundred South Korean managers remain in Kaesong to oversee operations.
sentences.cn: 数百名韩国管理人员仍然留在开城,监管工业园区的运作.
士兵们看管着救济食品。

sentences.en: To oversee and manage all area s of pre - production.
sentences.cn: 协助督导、理整个区域的 前期 生产.

sentences.en: Use a surveyor or architect to oversee and inspect the different stages of the work.
sentences.cn: 用一名监察员或建筑师去监督和检查工程的不同阶段。

sentences.en: You will oversee the operation and simultaneously begin the screening of candidates.
sentences.cn: 你全盘接管这个工程,同时开始候选人选拔工作.

trans.tran_en: to be in charge of a group of workers and check that a piece of work is done satisfactorily

trans.tran_cn: 监督，监视，俯瞰，错过，宽恕，省略
trans.tran_en: to be in charge of a group of workers and check that a piece of work is done satisfactorily
